keyword: how many calories in an olive garden breadstick
title: How Many Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an Olive Garden breadstick, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and simple tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick?
assumptions: Standard Olive Garden breadstick (about 48g), fresh-baked with garlic topping, no additional butter or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, portion size, and recipe changes. Check Olive Garden's official nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: One Olive Garden breadstick contains about 140 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many carbs in an Olive Garden breadstick?
Is an Olive Garden breadstick high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 740mg sodium due to the garlic seasoning.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Olive Garden breadstick?
Do Olive Garden breadsticks have cholesterol?
faqs.a: No cholesterol (0mg) in the standard breadstick.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie version at home?
faqs.a: Yes, use less butter in the dough and skip garlic topping to reduce calories by 20-30.
